mapper.insert: INSERT INTO level_log (user_id, old_level, new_level, gained_exp, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{oldLevel}, #{newLevel}, #{gainedExp}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT log_id as logId, user_id as userId, old_level as oldLevel, new_level as newLevel, gained_exp as gainedExp, created_at as createdAt FROM level_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
